Title: Relates to allowing taxpayers to make a gift to the adoption access fund on their personal income tax returns
Summary: Allows taxpayers to make a gift to the adoption access fund on their personal income tax returns; establishes the adoption access fund; allows for a tax deduction for gifts made to the adoption access fund.
LawCode: Add ยง630-h, amd ยง612, Tax L; add ยง99-hh, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the state finance law, in relation to allowing taxpayers to make a gift to the adoption access fund on their personal income tax returns
